content: संयमः {@--1@} Restraint, check, control; श्रोत्रादीनींद्रियाण्यन्ये संयमाग्निषु जुह्वति <ls>Bg. 4. 26</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 4.">27</ls>; so संयमधनः &c. {@--2@} Concentration of mind, a term applied to the last three stages of {%Yoga%}; धारणाध्यानसमाधित्रयमंतरंगं संयमपदवाच्यं <ls>Sarva. S.</ls>, <ls>Ku. 2. 59.</ls> {@--3@} A religious vow. {@--4@} Religious devotion, practice of penance; <ls>Ś. 4. 16.</ls> {@--5@} Humanity, feeling of compassion. {@--6@} Any religious act on the day preceding a vow or course of penance.
